data.title: Bill Johnson’s Wife Beni Johnson Dies Of Cancer
data.meta_description: Bill Johnson’s wife Beni now "Healthy & Free" after battle with cancer. The church has released a tribute describing the influence she had.
data.text:
13.8K

Bill Johnson’s wife, Beni Johnson, is now “Healthy & Free” with the Lord at the age of 67.

Beni Johnson

The entire Christian community is mourning the death of Beni Johnson, wife of Bethel Church senior pastor Bill Johnson. Beni has also been an author and an evangelist who spent her life working for the ministry of God. She has been a pastor and intercessor for over 25 years, most of those years has served with the Bethel Church.

Last night, July 13th, 2022, Beni passed away after a long battle against cancer at the age of 67. Bill announced her death on his Social Media accounts with the text: “Healthy and Free,” alongside a photo of her. According to reports, she passed away at home surrounded by family.

Passing Away

Hours prior to the announcement of her death, Bethel Church urged everyone to pray for a miracle for Beni.

“We continue to stand with the Johnsons for Beni’s complete healing. Medicine is a blessing and a great help, but at this moment, we need a miracle from the Lord. Please continue to pray for total deliverance from cancer, and for Beni’s strength to be renewed,” the Bethel Church page posted.

The church later released a tribute following her passing describing the influence she had.

“Beni Johnson is a mother to this house and has been for over 25 years. She has led the charge in the passionate pursuit of prayer for our movement and has taught us to intercede with joy and confidence. She has led both from the front and behind the scenes.”

They went on to share,

“She has consistently made herself known in the spirit as a warrior, a fighter, and a woman of love and truth. She has contended for us, and for the global Church, for decades in prayer.”
